resources.string: I\'ll calculate PI until you tell me to stop. The number of threads, and amount of time each task runs for will depend on the load (Low/Medium/High) setting.

Load up some images in memory. It\'s just a gradient, I promise I didn\'t violate anyone\'s copyright! The number of images I try to store depends on the load setting, but the amount of memory that I can eat up is limited by the system.
I\'m going to try to download an image off of S3. I will run on a couple more threads and more frequently if you increase the load.
